summary: This mod adds a 3-story player home / Jazz club to the game
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=#f79646][b]The Oiled Automaton by Undivide[/b][/color][/size][color=#ff0000][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][/font][/color][/center][center][color=#ff0000][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif]Like this mod? Show your support by endorsing it or even voting for it![/font][/color][size=5][b][u][/u][/b][/size][/center][center][size=5][b][u][img]http://s11.postimg.org/n5r88poyb/Screen_Shot66.jpg[/img][/u][/b][/size][/center][center][size=5][b][u][img]http://s2.postimg.org/k7wbukduh/Information.jpg[/img][/u][/b][/size][/center][center]This is a mod that adds a 3-story player home to the game. [/center][center]This house is navmeshed ( Your followers will follow you inside and npcs will interact with the environment properly.)[/center][center]Music handpicked by me[/center][center][color=#ffc000][b]Floor 1:[/b] [/color][/center][center]A fancy Neo-Dwemer restaurant which features a bar, a musical stage, 3 waterfalls, a pool, and fish. [/center][center]Light switch number 1 is here along with an
elevator to floor 2[/center][center][b][color=#ffc000]Floor 2: [/color][/b][/center][center]Living area. Several couches to sit on[/center][center]A bed[/center][center]A nice view of the stage [/center][center]Stage light switch[/center]
[center]Elevator to floor b1[/center][center][b][color=#ffc000]Floor B1: [/color][/b][/center][center]every vanilla crafting station
2 mannequins [/center]
[center][img]http://s11.postimg.org/r9hmnrjnn/location.jpg[/img][img]http://s24.postimg.org/bn8vlv4bp/Screen_Shot54.jpg[/img][/center][center][b][img]http://s2.postimg.org/o2v4je7mh/How_to_install.jpg[/img][/b][/center][center]Download with NMM (Recommended) or drop the contents of the folder into your Data folder. Make sure that Black_city.esp is below DwarvenDollFollower.esp in load order[/center][center][img]http://s23.postimg.org/b7vyfss6z/credandperms.jpg[/img][/center][center]Darkfox127: For his tutorials and marble floor resource. [/center][center]InsanitySorrow: For the sofas and curtains[/center][center]Strotis: For the organ[/center][center]Tenshi252: For testing[/center][center]Vicn: Creature resource and followers[/center][center]Royalty-Free Music courtesy of [url=http://www.purple-planet.com/#/jazz/4534205444]Purple Planet[/url][/center][center]Bethesda: For the game and creation kit. [/center]
author: Undivide
